name: Belly Button Lint Clicker - The addictive idle game
name_original: Belly Button Lint Clicker - The addictive idle game
description:
Belly Button Lint Clicker is a unique, simple, easy to pick up but hard to master, crazy addicting tap game.
Click on the belly button to grow belly button lint.
Unlock and take care of the fluffy pets.

* Addictive game play
* Beautiful graphics
* Great audio effects
* Cute and fun characters
* Game Center leaderboards

Download and click... click... click...

Please contact us if you have any problem:
